scripts.build: mkdir public; react-scripts build; python manage.py collectstatic; rm -rf public
scripts.deploy: echo 'Make sure you are in Master and the working tree is clean.'; echo 'This command will commit/PUSH and DEPLOY'; echo 'Press Ctrl+C to cancel and Enter to go ahead'; read; mkdir public; react-scripts build; python manage.py collectstatic; rm -rf public; git commit -am 'Auto collectstatic.'; git push origin master; eb deploy;
